Brief description: 5 card hands from a standard 52 card deck.
Preprocessing: Attributes of each hand are given, including the Poker hands formed by the cards it contains.
Reference: Cattral, Robert, Franz Oppacher, and Dwight Deugo. "Evolutionary data mining with automatic rule generalization." Recent Advances in Computers, Computing and Communications(2002): 296–300.
Creator: R. Cattral

Brief description: Contains all legal 8-ply positions in the game of connect-4 in which neither player has won yet, and in which the next move is not forced.
Reference: Burton, Ariel N., and Paul HJ Kelly. "Performance prediction of paging workloads using lightweight tracing." Future Generation Computer Systems22.7 (2006): 784–793.
Creator: J. Tromp

Brief description: Endgame Database for White King and Rook against Black King.
Reference: Bain, Michael, and Stephen Muggleton. "Learning optimal chess strategies." Machine intelligence 13. Oxford University Press, Inc., 1994. isbn = 978-3-662-12407-9
Creator: M. Bain et al.

Reference: Shapiro, Alen D. Structured induction in expert systems. Addison-Wesley Longman Publishing Co., Inc., 1987.
Creator: R. Holte

Brief description: Binary classification for win conditions in tic-tac-toe.
Creator: D. Aha
